title: CrownChange
author: CrownChange
content: https://crownchange.net/  CrownChange.net - instant electronic currency exchange service. This is a system that includes a set of necessary functions for convenient, fast and secure conversion of various electronic payment systems and cryptocurrencies. Our services will help you streamline your exchange process, ensuring that your payments are made quickly and accurately. CrownChange offers: -Fast processing of applications due to the availability of reserves; -Competitive exchange rates;-Favorable exchange conditions;-Reliable protection of your personal data;-Simple registration;-A wide range of exchange directions; -24/7 on-line chat; -Special offers for regular customers. CrownChange.net is available on the most popular cryptocurrency forums. We also provide referral and affiliate programs through which you can earn additional income. Our reputation has been tested by time and grateful customers, so you can safely make a quality exchange. Thank you for choosing our exchange office!

comments.author: rat03gopoh
comments.body: Just checked the Bestchange site, and there is no Crownchange name listed there while your site lists bestchange as a partner. Is there something I missed?Whois site also says that your site isn't yet 1 month oldQuote from: https://who.is/whois/crownchange.netImportant DatesExpires On 2023-10-13Registered On 2022-10-13Updated On 2022-10-14

comments.author: JeromeTash
comments.body: Is it just me or the just put down their website? It does not load from my side.Quote from: rat03gopoh on November 04, 2022, 11:40:07 AMWhois site also says that your site isn't yet 1 month oldLol, apparently in less than a month their reputation has been tested by time already  Quote from: CrownChange on November 03, 2022, 07:49:08 PMOur reputation has been tested by time and grateful customers, so you can safely make a quality exchange.This all stinks scam. Members should use available popular exchangers

comments.author: logon63
comments.body: I have been using various exchangers regularly for several months, and for the first time I received my money in less than 5 minutes! cool, thanks guys! Exchanger to favorites)

comments.author: rat03gopoh
comments.body: Quote from: logon63 on November 07, 2022, 07:12:32 AM~When noticing a new account immediately finding the official thread and writing satisfaction is adding to the point of suspicion. Just reminding the @OP that if you hire a shill service or create multiple accounts to write reviews, it won't do any good. I hope I'm wrong.

comments.author: Bitum
comments.body: Quote from: logon63 on November 07, 2022, 07:12:32 AMI have been using various exchangers regularly for several months, and for the first time I received my money in less than 5 minutes! cool, thanks guys! Exchanger to favorites)I assume you are one of the circle of support. Honestly, I have no problem that the domain is registered a month ago, everyone has to start at some point, I have a problem that the all-Russian team is behind it. From experience I can say that 90% of the time it doesn't bring anything good

comments.author: Certyn
comments.body: Everything is very fast, card verification is a couple of minutes, the rate is one of the best, the exchange takes a maximum of 5-10 minutes! I recommend

comments.author: vastotir
comments.body: The exchange went well. The exchanger is decent and the rate is suitable.

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: Wow, many newbie accounts trying to pump up this topic, I don't know, but the platform has enough red flags and you increasing it.Generally, since you mentioned Fast processing of applications due to the availability of reserves, can you prove these reserves, for example by signing a message or any other way?+ I entered a wrong bitcoin address (in fact I typed 55555) and it was accepted as the address.Warning, there are enough red flags to think this site is SACM!!!

comments.author: bigniz
comments.body: A good exchanger, the rate is one of the best, everything is prompt, they respond quickly in the chat, I will use it.

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: Quote from: bigniz on December 30, 2022, 09:42:38 AMA good exchanger, the rate is one of the best, everything is prompt, they respond quickly in the chat, I will use it.Date Registered (account created) :   Today at 09:41:57 AMLast Active         (last login)          :   Today at 09:42:12 AMPost created                                :     Today at 09:42:38 AMThis childish behavior will further prove that this platform is scam, if you continue to spam using new accounts, I will create a flag against this topic, so stop wasting your time.So far, you have not tried to convince us, so this kind of lazy scam is not worth it.

comments.author: zaydop
comments.body: I have used this exchange many times. Everything is fair and fast.

comments.author: NeuroticFish
comments.body: I find it interesting that only newbies with one post are praising this exchanger.It smells of accounts made by exchange's owner for promoting it. This is at very least shady...I tend to agree with the established members of the forum: this is most probably scam, please be careful!

comments.author: JeromeTash
comments.created_time: January 28, 2023, 09:59:54 PMLast edit: January 28, 2023, 10:23:23 PM by JeromeTash
comments.body: Quote from: NeuroticFish on January 27, 2023, 03:51:33 PMI find it interesting that only newbies with one post are praising this exchanger.It smells of accounts made by exchange's owner for promoting it. This is at very least shady...I tend to agree with the established members of the forum: this is most probably scam, please be careful!Yeah, they just confirmed it by trying brand-new accounts to shill their exchange. I think a trust flag should be more than justified on OP alongside negative trust for the sock puppets. I will create a reference.Edit:  Trust flag against OP: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=trust;flag=3095
